mapper.select:
SELECT a.wms_order_id, a.wms_order_no, a.owner_id, a.sale_order_id, a.sale_order_no, a.platform_order_code, a.platform_order_status, a.platform_type, a.purchase_order_id, a.purchase_state, a.purchase_order_no, a.order_type, a.shop_id, a.seller_memo, a.sale_order_memo, a.buyer_memo, a.buyer_email, a.buyer_nick, a.pay_type, a.pay_time, a.payment, a.total_fee, a.wms_order_type, a.wms_order_state, a.play_state, a.stop_state, a.sale_order_origin_type, a.tenant_id, a.is_approve, a.is_waybill, a.is_cancel, a.total_num, a.total_sku, a.waybill_type, a.is_wave, a.waved_time, a.wms_wave_id, a.wms_picking_order_no, a.auto_wave_count, a.is_manual, a.print_express_num, a.print_sensitive_num, a.print_deliver_num, a.picking_wall_id, a.picking_wall_cells_no, a.cell_no, a.group_no, a.sorted_time, a.weight_base_unit_id, a.weight, a.weight_time, a.real_weight, a.deliver_print_time, a.examine_goods_time, a.is_examine_goods, a.delivered_time, a.courier_id, a.courier_cost, a.courier_print_time, a.courier_print_mark_state, a.courier_print_show_seq, a.waybill_code, a.warehouse_id, a.packing_box_id, a.invoice_type, a.invoice_order_no, a.invoice_content, a.bank, a.title, a.bank_account, a.tian_mall_delivery, a.three_pl_timing, a.prescription_type, a.sender_address, a.sender_mobile, a.sender_name, a.obtain_time, a.create_time, a.last_update_time, a.is_usable, a.last_updater, a.creator, a.wms_picking_order_id,a.shop_name FROM wms_order as a, (SELECT wo.wms_order_id FROM wms_order as wo
ORDER BY wo.create_time DESC LIMIT #{page},#{pageSize} ) as b WHERE a.wms_order_id = b.wms_order_id;

SELECT a.wms_order_id, a.wms_order_no, a.owner_id, a.sale_order_id, a.sale_order_no, a.platform_order_code, a.platform_order_status, a.platform_type, a.purchase_order_id, a.purchase_state, a.purchase_order_no, a.order_type, a.shop_id, a.seller_memo, a.sale_order_memo, a.buyer_memo, a.buyer_email, a.buyer_nick, a.pay_type, a.pay_time, a.payment, a.total_fee, a.wms_order_type, a.wms_order_state, a.play_state, a.stop_state, a.sale_order_origin_type, a.tenant_id, a.is_approve, a.is_waybill, a.is_cancel, a.total_num, a.total_sku, a.waybill_type, a.is_wave, a.waved_time, a.wms_wave_id, a.wms_picking_order_no, a.auto_wave_count, a.is_manual, a.print_express_num, a.print_sensitive_num, a.print_deliver_num, a.picking_wall_id, a.picking_wall_cells_no, a.cell_no, a.group_no, a.sorted_time, a.weight_base_unit_id, a.weight, a.weight_time, a.real_weight, a.deliver_print_time, a.examine_goods_time, a.is_examine_goods, a.delivered_time, a.courier_id, a.courier_cost, a.courier_print_time, a.courier_print_mark_state, a.courier_print_show_seq, a.waybill_code, a.warehouse_id, a.packing_box_id, a.invoice_type, a.invoice_order_no, a.invoice_content, a.bank, a.title, a.bank_account, a.tian_mall_delivery, a.three_pl_timing, a.prescription_type, a.sender_address, a.sender_mobile, a.sender_name, a.obtain_time, a.create_time, a.last_update_time, a.is_usable, a.last_updater, a.creator, a.wms_picking_order_id,a.shop_name FROM wms_order as a, ( SELECT wo.wms_order_id FROM wms_order as wo
ORDER BY wo.wms_order_id LIMIT #{limitCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) as b WHERE a.wms_order_id = b.wms_order_id;

SELECT wo.wms_order_id FROM wms_order as wo
order by wo.pay_time

trim.if: and wo.seller_memo IS NOT NULL and wo.seller_memo != ''
and wo.waybill_code IS NOT NULL and wo.waybill_code != ''
and (wo.sale_order_memo IS NOT NULL and wo.sale_order_memo != '')

and wo.wms_order_id IN ( SELECT wod.wms_order_id FROM wms_order_detail wod WHERE wo.wms_order_id = wod.wms_order_id and (wod.bar_code = #{skuNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR wod.sku_no like concat(#{skuNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') OR wod.product_no like concat(#{skuNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') ))
and wo.wms_order_id IN ( SELECT wod.wms_order_id FROM wms_order_detail wod WHERE wo.wms_order_id = wod.wms_order_id and wod.unique_code = #{uniqueCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
AND wo.wms_order_id IN (SELECT wo.wms_order_id FROM wms_order_receiver wor WHERE wo.wms_order_id = wor.wms_order_id and wor.receiver_name like concat(#{receiverName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
AND wo.wms_order_id IN (SELECT wo.wms_order_id FROM wms_order_receiver wor WHERE wo.wms_order_id = wor.wms_order_id and wor.receiver_mobile like concat(#{receiverMobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))

mapper.select:
SELECT
from wms_order
and wms_order_id IN
#{item,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and is_usable = 1 and is_cancel = 0 and stop_state = 0

SELECT
FROM wms_order
and sale_order_id in
#{item,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and tenant_id = #{tenantId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_usable = 1 and is_cancel = 0
